# table2 to table1

```{r}
table2 %>% 
  spread(..., ...)
```

# table1 to table2

```{r}
table2 %>% 
  gather(..., ..., ........)
```

```{r}
table2 %>% 
  gather(..., ..., ........) %>% 
  ...
```

Are the two calls symmetrical?

# Plot table-x

For showing one measurement:

```{r}
table... %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(..., ..., fill = ...))
```

For showing both measurements:

```{r}
table... %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(..., ..., fill = ...)) +
  facet_wrap(~...)
```

# Binding

```{r}
cases_tbl <-

bind_rows(cases_tbl, population_tbl) %>%
```
